External Description:
With an experience of over 19 years, dcs plus is a technology company that provides business critical enterprise software for the travel and tourism industry.
Backed up by passion and years of insights gathered while working closely with travel professionals, dcs plus provides a full software stack of solutions, addressing the complex needs of all types of travel companies. dcs plus? software perform across the travel distribution chain, helping travel agencies maximize revenue and improve process efficiency while optimizing operating costs.

Headquartered in Europe, dcs plus has regional offices in:
? Bucharest ? Romania ? for European markets
? Dubai ? United Arab Emirates ? for Middle East and Africa markets
? Singapore ? for Asia Pacific markets
? Sao Paolo ? Brazil for Latin American markets
? Gurgaon ? India

Having 2 of the largest European Venture Capital Funds, EarlyBird and Credo Venture, as shareholders reconfirms the sustained dedication and drive of the dcs plus team.

The travel technology ecosystem provided by dcs plus is designed in house and consists of a mid-back office (TINA), a booking engine/ agent desktop (IRIX), an OBT (NOVA), a B2C online solution (TRIP) and an inventory management application (AIDA). This software suite allows the agencies to maximize their revenue through the sales channels (IRIX/NOVA/TRIP/AIDA), while the mid-back office (TINA) optimizes operational processes making the travel agency more efficient and thereby reducing costs and increasing profit.

The company?s portfolio of customers is spread across more than 50 markets worldwide consisting of some of the global leaders in each of their segments: Travel Management Companies (Amex GBT, BCD, Egencia, GlobalStar, Radius, Reed&MacKay, Uniglobe, ATPI, Lufthansa City Center, HRG, FCM, Travel Leaders Group etc.), Professional Congress Organizers and Destination Management Companies, Online Travel Agents, Wholesalers, Tour Operators etc.

3fullsteps.com is an exclusively Business- to- Business (B2B) online reservation system which allows travel agencies/tour operators to have access to an extensive content of worldwide products.Founded in 2015, we are confident we have a great range of product coverage and the best available negotiated rates.Our aim is to offer the best possible service to our customers, by providing them with an easy and user friendly online program that is constantly updated either by adding new product or by investing on new technology.Having invested much in our services, our dedicated & highly experienced staff is available 24/7 to help you with any query requested.We work to maintain & develop strong and long term partnerships both with our suppliers and our customers.

Revenue Maximizing Solutions for Hotels & Online Reservation Systems

BookLogic provides Revenue Maximizing Solutions for Hotels & Online Reservation Systems for the Travel industry. BookLogic enables you to easily maximize your hotels? bookings and revenue and to increase your sales by your online distribution channels.

BookLogic maximizes your hotels? yearly RevPAR ratio, automate your hotel reservation management process, and connect your hotel to 650.000+ travel agencies and 150+ online hotel portals worldwide through our one-stop-distribution solution.

For Travel Agencies and Tour Operators, BookLogic provides Automation System and Online Reservation Systems for the management and sales of tourism services such as hotels, flights, car rentals, excursions, transfers, cruises, boat rentals, yachting, packages, dynamic packages and so on.

BookLogic provides Complete Hotel Solutions and Online Reservation Systems for hotels and hotel chains.

Smartbooking is the B2B Trade Brand of "Sameh Voyages" a DMC based in Tunisia.

Smartbooking is an online wholesaler operating since 2016 in the North African Market

Smartbooking was developed for professionals in the travel and tourism industry looking for hotels, tourist circuits, high quality city tours and other services in North Africa especially in Tunisia, with competitive prices and instant confirmation.

Smartbooking offers B2B access through the Web portal, XML / API integrations and white label for selected professionals.

Our competitive offers and performant helpdesk made our reputation in the north african market.

Our main target is to develop our activity through international new partnerships allowing us to reach New Markets through IN/OUT Api integrations.

SKAPIT is the world's only ski-dedicated API. We have aggregated all the different technologies surrounding a ski accommodation (hotels, apartments, self catered and catered chalets) in Europe and North America, and consolidated them into one API (SKAPIT Integrate) that is now available via TravelgateX (both via Pull and Push connections). All of the product is pre-contracted - so it is simply a case of making the connection via TravelgateX, choosing the Product you want, and instantly start selling. The API is multi-lingual, thus suitable for most markets. Alongside the API you are able to sell Ski Extras (Ski Passes, Ski Hire, Ski School, Ski Transfers) and we have market-leading Resort information in order to position you as the expert in ski from the start.

Our staff our incredibly knowledgeable about all things ski - so there is the necessary support/information in order to achieve maximum sales without the steep learning curve.

So if you want to quickly and easily add Ski to your portfolio - connect with SKAPIT via Travelgate.

To date, B2BHolidays has served tens of thousands of travel companies which makes it the leading agency specialising in accommodation and flight services.

Beds4Greece is a project by two leaders of the Greek tourism industry combining forces - Hellenic Zeus & GEM Travel.
Hellenic Zeus was formed all the way back in 1966 by Ioannis Papakaliatis and his sons. It was the first incoming and handling agency in Crete, collaborating with renowned European Tour Operators. Since then, it hasn?t stopped growing and has become one the Leading Destination Companies in Greece.

We break boundaries when it comes to offering solutions. We are the strong point you are looking for, in the tourism business.

Helping hotels better connect things
There is a notion that companies need to build everything in-house. That building yourself saves money and improves margins.
?
But at Channex we believe you can outsource key services and that it is good for the bottom line and will improve customer satisfaction.
?

Pan Pacific is a privately-owned and operated Australasian inbound operator with companies in Australia & New Zealand. Established in 1984, we have grown to become one of the region?s most successful and respected operators with an extensive worldwide customer-base.



In July 2016 Pan Pacific acquired the business of Finesse South Pacific Travel, a highly regarded Australian inbound company with a proud and successful 30-year history as Australia?s leading operator in the Latin markets.

While its primary business activity is an Inbound Operator, Pan Pacific holds a substantial interest in one of New Zealand?s most progressive Conference & Event Organisers, Event Dynamics.

Given our many shared clients, Pan Pacific Australia/New Zealand work closely together to ensure consistency in servicing & operational procedures and a seamless experience for client partners who work with us in both countries.



Our Business Philosophy

The cornerstone of an Inbound Operator?s role is to provide excellent service, competitive pricing and quality product however Pan Pacific?s objective is to add more value to its client relationships and pro-actively contribute to their business growth.

We believe this can be achieved through regular communication, an intimate understanding of our clients? business and a creative, ?can do? attitude in constantly seeking better and more innovative ways to support their needs and enhance their competitive advantage. Succeeding in this will only deliver increased growth to our own business.



Full-Service Operation

A 2 person tailor-made FIT, a special interest group of 30, an incentive program of 500, a sports event of 4000 or foreign-language escorted coach tours - Pan Pacific has the experience and operational infrastructure to service any inbound-Australia/New Zealand leisure or corporate travel requirement.



Market Diversity

Pan Pacific has one of the most market-diverse customer portfolio of any inbound company in Australia/New Zealand with client partners located in the following regions;



Asia ? China, Taiwan
Europe ? France, Italy, Spain, Portugal, the Netherlands, Switzerland
North America ? USA, Canada
Scandinavia ? Sweden, Finland, Denmark
South Africa
South America ? Argentina, Brazil, Colombia
South East Asia ? Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Philippines
United Kingdom


In recognition of our broad market mix Pan Pacific staff possess a wide range of foreign-language skills.

Industry Memberships

AUSTRALIA
ATEC
The Australia Tourism Export Council (ATEC) is the peak industry body representing Australia's $40 billion tourism export sector. As an organisation, our views are informed by the broadest cross-section of the Australian tourism industry.

ATEC represents more than 1000 members across Australia including large national and multinational companies as well as small and medium-sized enterprises, many of whom are based in regional and remote parts of Australia.

Our members include inbound tour operators and online distributors who connect Australian tourism products with vital distribution channels in key overseas markets. Those tourism products include accommodation providers, tour companies, attractions, airlines, cruise lines, transport operators, food and beverage outlets and tourism services including retail outlets, educational institutions and guiding organisations.

Our services include B2B opportunities, industry advocacy and development, education and business capacity building, local and national networking events and conferences.

NEW ZEALAND
QUALMARK
Pan Pacific Travel is a Qualmark Endorsed Inbound Tour Operator and has also been awarded the "Covid Clean" assessment, recognised by the World Travel & Tourism Council.

NZ TEC - TOURISM EXPORT COUNCIL OF NEW ZEALAND
The Tourism Export Council of New Zealand (TECNZ) is a trade association established in 1971 that represents the interests of the New Zealand inbound tourism industry.
Our mission is to support and represent our members to achieve sustainable growth in export earnings.
We are committed to adding value to tourism businesses and to providing a vital link between tour operators and suppliers of NZ products and services.
TECNZ offers opportunities throughout the year for networking and discussion forums to address current issues.

NZ TIA - TOURISM INDUSTRY AOTEAROA NEW ZEALAND
Tourism Industry Aotearoa (TIA) is the only independent association that represents all sectors of New Zealand's large and diverse tourism industry. We accomplish what no single member or sector group could achieve by themselves.

Our Vision - A $41 billion visitor economy by 2025.
We are vocal supporters of our industry, advocating relentlessly to ensure tourism gets recognised as a vital contributor to New Zealand?s economic and social wellbeing.

Our Mission - Through leadership, influence and action, achieve tangible benefits for the tourism industry and New Zealand.
Our members range from SMEs to large, publicly listed corporates. Collectively, they represent around 85% of total tourism industry turnover. The more members and support TIA has, the stronger our influence and the more we can achieve

WINGSPAN
Pan Pacific Travel is proud to support the Wingspan Programme and in particular their work with the threatened New Zealand Falcon.
We sponsor "Maia", a very special falcon who was one of the falcons bred at Wingspan and released as part of "On the Wing"; the first ever city release of a threatened species.
While Maia was released in 2014, she remains (almost on a daily basis) returning to the Rotorua Museum (Government Gardens) for supplementary food left out for her, but generally resides (and nests) in the Redwoods in Whakarewarewa Forest.

SUSTAINABLE TOURISM

Pan Pacific has signed up to the Tourism Sustainability Commitment and joined a fast-growing group of New Zealand tourism operators who are working to make a positive difference.
The New Zealand Tourism Sustainability commitment aims to see every New Zealand tourism business committed to sustainability by 2025 - with a Vision of Leading the World in Sustainable Tourism. To deliver on this, we must achieve ambitious economic goals while sharing the overwhelming benefits with supportive host communities, contributing to restoring, protecting and enhancing our natural environment, and continuing to be a high quality destination of choice for domestic and international travellers.

We at BookingJini strive to empower Hotels from all aspects ranging from customer outreach to automate their booking process and improve their online presence and revenue to stimulate Top-line and Bottom-line growth.

We offer an unrestricted mobile-friendly website, which is effortless to use with free secure hosting & an in-depth control panel. Customize your site at your wish with amazing content, comments and much more. The control is all yours. Opt for any theme offered by Bookingjini for your hotel, guest house, motel, serviced apartment and a lot more.

Bookingjini provides a range of products to its partners that include the iBooking Engine, Channel Manager, SnapApp, among others.

Acquire virtual bookings from your website. Bookingjini provides a smart booking engine which generates a sense of reliance in clients without altering the URL from your website to other 3rd party booking panel.

Bookingjini, through its numerous products thus offers the ability to a hotel to increase its presence and improve customer flow online without having to rely on other agencies.

PHOBS is a supplier of advanced reservation technology for hotels, resorts, campsites, hotel chains, and virtually any overnight accommodation world wide.

The philosophy of PHOBS is total flexibility in creating prices, packages and sales policy by applying innovative sales tools and an extremely user-friendly interface.

Specialized in sales of resorts and remote seasonal properties, it offers a set of tour-operator like tools which can easily convert your own web page into best performing sales channel.

The PHOBS suite includes a fully integrated CRS, a multilingual Booking engine, distribution hub, reservation application, Fax&SMS gateway, PMS switch, Credit Card processing switch and much more...

Whether you are a small inn, with just a few rooms or global hotel chain with properties on different continents, PHOBS will boost your sales, reduce costs and save time.

Our API supplier Hub is connected to more than 30 industry partners, there to increase or launch your portfolio with access to more than 2 M hotel and alternative lodging options and with car rental, insurance and ancillaries all coming soon. Think of us also for custom design or development projects, upgrades or enhancements to take your platform to the next level. Travcoding - Technology Helping Travel.
We help people, eat better, live better

Hikari Global is Korea's leading hotel reservation company based on XML/B2B/B2B2C, starting from Japan to Singapore, Hong Kong, and Southeast Asia. The freedom and joy of light exploring all corners of the world with Hikari Global's unique service mind, we will be reborn as a travel service company specializing in "feeling and touching". Since 1996 we have been helping our clients boost the growth of their business and revenue. Although our methods are complex, our aim is simple: to help increase sales of your products. As the tourism industry's leading provider of non-bookable content, our 100-plus employees continuously set new standards in travel sales and in the processing and distribution of hotel content. So take advantage of our employees' know-how and experience and concentrate on what's important: your core business.

The Palladium Hotel Group hotel chain was founded in the late 1960s in Ibiza by businessman Abel Matutes Juan, who dreamed of bringing paradise within the reach of travellers and offering them amazing experiences. He set out to design the most exclusive accommodation, based on the fundamental concepts of luxury, quality and first-class service. He took his first steps in the Balearic Islands and the Canary Islands, and in the early 1990s he continued the adventure by opening several resorts in the Caribbean. He then built on his success by opening hotels in top world destinations: Spain, Italy, Dominican Republic, Mexico, Jamaica and Brazil. In 2000, these hotels were grouped together under the name of Fiesta Hotel Group. In 2012, the group opted to update its company image and became Palladium Hotel Group, taking its name from its five-star Caribbean resorts. The aim is to convey a corporate philosophy based on excellence and on high standards of quality, as well as the drive to progress and increase the group's international profile. Palladium Hotel Group was created to clearly define the direction of a new stage in which the customer and human capital are the Group's priority.

We are an operator specialized in the management of groups and cultural circuits, in addition to having other tourist products. Our main clients are traditional travel agencies in Spain and Portugal; although we also cover OTAs and in our expansion plan we incorporate foreign travel agencies, acting as incoming.

e-HTL Reservas Online de Hoteis Ltda provides travel services. The Company offers hotel booking and reservation services for traveling purposes, as well as discounts on hotel prices. e-HTL Reservas operates out of Brazil.

We are one of the most important DMC wholesale operators in Argentina. For more than 10 years, in Conextur we design and plan programs that fit the requirements we identify in the local and foreign markets. We offer 500 directly contracted hotels in Argentina.

Allbeds is a hotel broker part of CVD Group, born in 2015. The broker was created to fulfill and complement wholesalers, tour operators and OTA's accommodation supply needs.
We are proud to have a state of the art booking engine which allows us to stay ahead in today's highly competitive and fast-paced travel industry.

Saltours International holds the unrivalled distinction of introducing the concept of wholesale tourism worldwide. As a leader in this field, the company has grown from strength to strength and today holds a lion's share of the market. With unrivaled efficiency, innovation, and above all a passion for detail, the name Saltours has become synonymous with excellence and a holiday worth remembering!
Created in France in 2009, Gekko brings together experts and technology to deliver renowned IT solutions, developed for the leisure & corporate travel industry and its different actors.

RTS was launched in 2004 as a trade-only hotel booking engine and has been growing steadily since. The user friendly technology, highlighted by the ease of integration with our partner systems and the speed and reliability has helped us build a loyal partnership base which has increased 5 times in the past 5 years.

We are a part of the Trip.com Group, a NASDAQ listed company since 2003 (NASDAQ: TCOM) with over 45,100 employees and over 400 million members, making it one of the leading online travel agencies in the world.

Tboholidays.com is a B2B travel portal that allows travel agents to book over 330,000 hotels worldwide in real time. Backed by cutting edge technology and superior customer support, tboholidays.com is your one stop shop for all holiday booking requirements.

Seera is the new name for Al Tayyar Travel Group, the largest travel, and tourism group in the MENA region.

Seera means journey. A symbol of change. A positive step into the future. We're opening up the opportunity of travel for everyone by connecting cultures, through a balanced portfolio of trusted brands that consistently exceeds customer expectations.

THE TRAVEL JUNCTION OCCUPIES A UNIQUE SPACE WITHIN THE TRAVEL INDUSTRY; AN ENERGETIC START-UP BACKED BY THE WISDOM AND BUYING POWER OF A GLOBAL TRAVEL GIANT WITH OVER 40 YEARS? EXPERIENCE.
TTJ?s story began in 2018 when founding General Manager, James Whiting, began the process of developing the business as a response to the external demand for Flight Centre Travel Group?s contracted product. Originally started as a project aside from his main role, the overwhelming response to our product meant it didn?t take long for TTJ to mature into something greater.

Today, TTJ allows people and businesses outside of FCTG to access a selection of world?s best travel products and some of the strongest and most robust industry relationships, backed by decades of industry experience.

The Travel Junction ? Opening our world to you.

MTS City Breaks, member of MARINE TOURS group of companies, is a B2B booking platform offering access to exclusive wholesaler rates globally. Established in 1997, in Athens, Greece, MTS City Breaks' booking tool displays over half a million accommodation properties combining preferred hotels agreements and wholesaler rates into a single booking platform that allow partners to save time and earn more. We have over 20 years of experience and our Worldwide distribution is over 3000 active partners in over 50 countries.

NextPax is the most advanced channel management technology provider for hotels, resorts and vacation rentals worldwide, recognised for delivering the most advanced full-service solutions between property management systems and distribution channels worldwide. Connect your vacation rentals, hotels and/or vacation parks to over 100+ booking channels around the world.

BookingAgora is a leading B2B marketplace with the fastest access to best deals.
Our partners enjoy from a large variety of accommodation options, in-house developed technology products, flight ticketing and 24/7 customer service support.

Eurotours markets the most beautiful destinations in Austria and the neighbouring countries. Originally founded as an incoming agency, over the years Eurotours has grown to become the leading incoming agency in Central Europe. But in the meantime Eurotours offers much more: as a full-range multi-channel distributor in the DACH region and the neighbouring countries, today Eurotours acts as a one-stop shop for tour operators. More than 1900 tour operators in 70 countries worldwide appreciate our high-quality product design. In addition, over 3000 hotel partners and 3500 other service providers worldwide trust in our many years of proven expertise in tourism.

EZLINK is the first genuinely Brazilian Broker, with direct hotel contracts. We also act as multibrokers, to serve our partners with the greatest possible availability. Our customers are made up exclusively of Tour Operators throughout the Americas. Our main objective is to improve the profitability and agility of these partners, with the connection of the best treatment that each reservation can have.

EverRooms is a dynamic technology company focussing on global distribution of hotel rates.
EverRooms was founded in Germany by tech enthusiasts and travel experts. We combine deep knowledge of the travel industry with analytical skills, sourcing knowledge, and tech know-how. We have been distributing hotel rates since 2012 in B2B and B2C environments. Due to a decade of experience in metasearch distribution, our offerings incorporates sophisticated rate caching, room type matching, a specialized server structure for high-traffic schemes, and elaborated rate distribution.

Atharva Infotech is a dynamic software company providing a new range of open, enterprise-wide business solutions to the travel industry based on .Net technology. Our solutions are both flexible and modular in design and can be easily integrated with your existing front or back office systems.
